DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates changes in health related quality of life outcomes in patients using Oxytrol(r)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients with one or more symptom of overactive bladder, including urge urinary incontinence, urgency and/or frequency Patients for whom Oxytrol(r) is contraindicated. Patients treated with Oxytrol(r) prior to participation in this study. Patients residing in longterm care facilities or nursing homes.
